alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:28AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN KENTON, SOUTH CENTRAL CAMPBELL, SOUTHERN BOONE, GRANT, WESTERN PENDLETON AND EAST CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 600 AM EDT... At 527 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Walton, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Walton, Falmouth, Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Butler, Stewartsville, Atwood, Ryle, Northcutt, Bracht, Gardnersville, Fiskburg, Sherman, Elliston, Goforth, Munk, Greenwood, Cherry Grove and Morning View. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 67 and 68, and between mile markers 70 and 71. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 151 and 172. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Campbell; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Pendleton
